definitions.definition: A sexual partner, especially a casual one.
A thing of no value, a small amount.
To have sexual intercourse, to copulate.
definitions.example: Fighting for peace is like fucking for virginity.

definitions.definition: To insert one’s penis, a dildo or other phallic object, into a specified orifice or cleft.
To put in an extremely difficult or impossible situation.
definitions.example: I'm afraid they're gonna fuck you on this one.

definitions.definition: To defraud, deface or otherwise treat badly.
definitions.example: I got fucked at the used car lot.

definitions.definition: Used to express great displeasure with someone or something.
definitions.example: Fuck those jerks, and fuck their stupid rules!

definitions.definition: (usually followed by up) To break, to destroy.
To make a joke at one's expense; to make fun of in an embarrassing manner.

definitions.example: He fucked the dirty cloth out the window.
The sergeant fucked me upside down.
